title: Remove Oregon flower decorative section from Home page

requirements.text: Remove the recently added Oregon flower decorative elements from the Home page so they no longer render (the four non-interactive, aria-hidden images under the "New Oregon flower decorations" comment in the decorative background layer).
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the decorative background layer no longer includes any elements referencing: /assets/generated/ls-oregon-flower-oak.dim_512x512.png, /assets/generated/ls-oregon-flower-oregon-grape.dim_512x512.png, /assets/generated/ls-oregon-flower-camas.dim_512x512.png, /assets/generated/ls-oregon-flower-trillium.dim_512x512.png.
The rest of the Home page layout (header, details cards, flyer image, and CTA buttons) remains unchanged aside from the removed decorations.
No console errors are introduced on the Home page due to the removed elements.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose only).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Do not create or modify Oregon flower image assets; only remove their rendering from the UI.
Do not change any program copy, navigation, or other page content unrelated to the removed Oregon flower decorations.
